verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> determined שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> And Solomon לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> for the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבַ֖יִת <WH1004> and an house לְמַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> for his kingdom

וַיִּסְפֹּ֨ר <WH5608> told out שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> And Solomon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> threescore and ten אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men סַבָּ֔ל <WH5449> to bear burdens וּשְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> he חֹצֵ֣ב <WH2672> to hew בָּהָ֑ר <WH2022> in the mountain וּמְנַצְּחִ֣ים <WH5329> to oversee עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֶל־ <WH413> to חוּרָ֥ם <WH2361> to Huram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king צֹ֖ר <WH6865> of Tyre לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> As thou didst deal עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> with David אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father וַתִּֽשְׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> and didst send ל֣וֹ אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> him cedars לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> to build ל֥וֹ בַ֖יִת <WH1004> him an house לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> to dwell בּֽוֹ׃

הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I am בֽוֹנֶה־ <WH1129> Behold I build בַּ֜יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֣ם ׀ <WH8034> to the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהָ֗י <WH430> my God לְהַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <WH6942> to dedicate ל֡וֹ לְהַקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> [it] to him [and] to burn לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before קְטֹֽרֶת־ <WH7004> incense סַמִּים֩ <WH5561> him sweet וּמַעֲרֶ֨כֶת <WH4635> shewbread תָּמִ֤יד <WH8548> and for the continual וְעֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> and for the burnt offerings לַבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> morning וְלָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> and evening לַשַּׁבָּתוֹת֙ <WH7676> on the sabbaths וְלֶ֣חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2320> and on the new moons וּֽלְמוֹעֲדֵ֖י <WH4150> and on the solemn feasts יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> This [is an ordinance] for ever זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise עַל־ <WH5921> in יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> to Israel

וְהַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> And the house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am בוֹנֶ֖ה <WH1129> which I build גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> [is] great כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָד֥וֹל <WH1419> for great אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> [is] our God מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> above all gods

וּמִ֤י <WH4310> who יַעֲצָר־ <WH6113> be able כֹּ֙חַ֙ <WH3581> ability לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> to build ל֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <WH1004> him an house כִּ֧י <WH3588> for הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> seeing the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֥י <WH8064> and heaven הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heavens לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְכַלְכְּלֻ֑הוּ <WH3557> cannot contain וּמִ֤י <WH4310> who אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> should אֶבְנֶה־ <WH1129> him? who [am] I then that I should build לּ֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <WH1004> him an house כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> save only לְהַקְטִ֥יר <WH6999> to burn sacrifice לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now שְֽׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> Send לִ֣י אִישׁ־ <WH376> me now therefore a man חָכָ֡ם <WH2450> cunning לַעֲשׂוֹת֩ <WH6213> to work בַּזָּהָ֨ב <WH2091> in gold וּבַכֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> and in silver וּבַנְּחֹ֣שֶׁת <WH5178> and in brass וּבַבַּרְזֶ֗ל <WH1270> and in iron וּבָֽאַרְגְּוָן֙ <WH710> and in purple וְכַרְמִ֣יל <WH3758> and crimson וּתְכֵ֔לֶת <WH8504> and blue וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> and that can skill לְפַתֵּ֣חַ <WH6605> to make פִּתּוּחִ֑ים <WH6603> engravings עִם־ <WH5973> have הַֽחֲכָמִ֗ים <WH2450> with the cunning men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> have בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> that [are] with me in Judah וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֵכִ֖ין <WH3559> did provide דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> whom David אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> my father

וּֽשְׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> Send לִי֩ עֲצֵ֨י <WH6086> trees אֲרָזִ֜ים <WH730> me also cedar בְּרוֹשִׁ֣ים <WH1265> fir trees וְאַלְגּוּמִּים֮ <WH418> and algum trees מֵֽהַלְּבָנוֹן֒ <WH3844> out of Lebanon כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> for I know אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> your עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> that thy servants יֽוֹדְעִ֔ים <WH3045> can skill לִכְר֖וֹת <WH3772> to cut עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> timber לְבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> in Lebanon וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and indeed עֲבָדַ֖י <WH5650> and behold my servants עִם־ <WH5973> with עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> [shall be] with thy servants

וּלְהָכִ֥ין <WH3559> Even to prepare לִ֛י עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> me timber לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> in abundance כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> for the house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am בוֹנֶ֖ה <WH1129> which I am about to build גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> great וְהַפְלֵֽא׃ <WH6381> [shall be] wonderful

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold לַֽחֹטְבִ֣ים ׀ <WH2404> the hewers לְֽכֹרְתֵ֣י ׀ <WH3772> that cut הָעֵצִ֡ים <WH6086> timber נָתַתִּי֩ <WH5414> And behold I will give חִטִּ֨ים ׀ <WH2406> wheat מַכּ֜וֹת <WH4347> of beaten לַעֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> to thy servants כֹּרִים֙ <WH3734> measures עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׂעֹרִ֕ים <WH8184> of barley כֹּרִ֖ים <WH3734> measures עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand וְיַ֗יִן <WH3196> of wine בַּתִּים֙ <WH1324> baths עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֶׁ֕מֶן <WH8081> of oil בַּתִּ֖ים <WH1324> baths עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> answered חוּרָ֤ם <WH2361> Then Huram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king צֹר֙ <WH6865> of Tyre בִּכְתָ֔ב <WH3791> in writing וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> which he sent אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> to Solomon בְּאַהֲבַ֤ת <WH160> hath loved יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Because the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people נְתָנְךָ֥ <WH5414> he hath made עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> thee king

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said חוּרָם֒ <WH2361> Huram בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> moreover Blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> that made אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> and earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נָתַן֩ <WH5414> who hath given לְדָוִ֨יד <WH1732> to David הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> a wise יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> endued שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> with prudence וּבִינָ֔ה <WH998> and understanding אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִבְנֶה־ <WH1129> that might build בַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> an house לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD וּבַ֖יִת <WH1004> and an house לְמַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> for his kingdom

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שָׁלַ֧חְתִּי <WH7971> And now I have sent אִישׁ־ <WH376> man חָכָ֛ם <WH2450> a cunning יוֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> endued בִּינָ֖ה <WH998> with understanding לְחוּרָ֥ם <WH2361> of Huram אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> my father's

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אִשָּׁ֞ה <WH802> of a woman מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters דָּ֗ן <WH1835> of Dan וְאָבִ֣יו <WH1> and his father אִישׁ־ <WH376> [was] a man צֹרִ֡י <WH6876> of Tyre יוֹדֵ֡עַ <WH3045> skilful לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to work בַּזָּֽהָב־ <WH2091> in gold וּ֠בַכֶּסֶף <WH3701> and in silver בַּנְּחֹ֨שֶׁת <WH5178> in brass בַּבַּרְזֶ֜ל <WH1270> in iron בָּאֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> in stone וּבָעֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> and in timber בָּאַרְגָּמָ֤ן <WH713> in purple בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> in blue וּבַבּ֣וּץ <WH948> and in fine linen וּבַכַּרְמִ֔יל <WH3758> and in crimson וּלְפַתֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH6605> also to grave כָּל־ <WH3605> all פִּתּ֔וּחַ <WH6603> any manner of graving וְלַחְשֹׁ֖ב <WH2803> and to find out כָּל־ <WH3605> any מַחֲשָׁ֑בֶת <WH4284> every device אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יִנָּֽתֶן־ <WH5414> which shall be put לוֹ֙ עִם־ <WH5973> with חֲכָמֶ֔יךָ <WH2450> to him with thy cunning men וְֽחַכְמֵ֔י <WH2450> and with the cunning men אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> of my lord דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> David אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thy father

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Now הַחִטִּ֨ים <WH2406> Now therefore the wheat וְהַשְּׂעֹרִ֜ים <WH8184> and the barley הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> the oil וְהַיַּ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> and the wine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which אָמַ֣ר <WH559> hath spoken אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> which my lord יִשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> of let him send לַעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> unto his servants

וַ֠אֲנַחְנוּ <WH587> we נִכְרֹ֨ת <WH3772> And we will cut עֵצִ֤ים <WH6086> wood מִן־ <WH4480> from הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> out of Lebanon כְּכָל־ <WH3605> whatever צָרְכֶּ֔ךָ <WH6878> as much as thou shalt need וּנְבִיאֵ֥ם <WH935> and we will bring לְךָ֛ רַפְסֹד֖וֹת <WH7513> it to thee in floats עַל־ <WH5921> by יָ֣ם <WH3220> by sea יָפ֑וֹ <WH3305> to Joppa וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you תַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> and thou shalt carry it up אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem פ

וַיִּסְפֹּ֣ר <WH5608> numbered שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> And Solomon כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> he הַגֵּירִים֙ <WH1616> alien אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> were בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> that [were] in the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הַסְּפָ֔ר <WH5610> the numbering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after סְפָרָ֖ם <WH5608> had numbered דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> wherewith David אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַיִּמָּצְא֗וּ <WH4672> them and they were found מֵאָ֤ה <WH3967> an hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁים֙ <WH2572> and fifty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> And he set מֵהֶ֜ם <WH1992> like שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> threescore and ten אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand סַבָּ֔ל <WH5449> of them [to be] bearers of burdens וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand חֹצֵ֣ב <WH2672> [to be] hewers בָּהָ֑ר <WH2022> in the mountain וּשְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> and three אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred מְנַצְּחִ֖ים <WH5329> overseers לְהַעֲבִ֥יד <WH5647> a work אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people
